title: Logout Option
body:
Hello people,

What are peoples opinion on having a logout option instead of having to close the entire client just to log into another account.
Is there a way to get RIOT to notice us about such options?

:)

replies.body: Considering Riot don't want people to smurf in the first place, i doubt they would put in a feature that would basically help only smurfs

I think you'll find it's less that the feature has never been considered, and more that there are other much higher priority features that warrant the attention first. Reddit or NA boards are probably better options if you want to gauge community opinion (higher and more diverse populations) but I wouldn't hold out hope on it being an 'any time soon' kinda thing.
